schema:creator: Long, J.D.
schema:description: Dirt plaster and oil exterior coating; Constructed of adobe blocks made from red "foothill" soil on the site and stuccoed outside with a similar soil plaster. Oil coating of linseed and motor flushing oil gave hard surface. Several coatings were being tried experimentally on the end of the shed.
schema:keywords: .1 Materials, manufacture, tests, strength, preservation, etc.
schema:name: Machine Shed of Adobe Block, U.S. Govt. Plant Acclimation Station, Torrey Pines, California
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
